passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(1) > header:nth-child(1) > nav:nth-child(9) > ul > li:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > ul:nth-child(1) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > footer > div:nth-child(2) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > footer > div:nth-child(4) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > footer > div:nth-child(5) > h4:nth-child(1)
